Plot: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.
Title: Stuart Little 2
Writer: E.B. White (characters from the book "Stuart Little"), Douglas Wick (story), Bruce Joel Rubin (story), Bruce Joel Rubin (screenplay)
Actors: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie, Jonathan Lipnicki
tomatoConsensus: Stuart Little 2 is a sweet, visually impressive sequel that provides wholesome entertainment for kids.
